text: Had my first offsite health screening at HOP Clinic Tampines and it was a great experience. The process was smooth and well-organized from start to finish. The staff were friendly, professional, and made sure I was comfortable throughout. I appreciated how everything was clearly explained, and the whole screening took less than 45 minutes. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a hassle-free health screening!

This is my first time visiting their clinic and experience is 1st class. I was serve by Aaron, he is very polite and patient. To my surprise he can speak very well mandarin though he is an Eurasian. Highly recommended 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

Came for the health screening and the whole process was very smooth. The front counter staff and the nurse were very clear about the process and there was no delay. The doctor will explain in detail the different tests that I can opt in. There is no hard selling on the different packages and I felt comfortable throughout.

I had a great experience at HOP Tampines branch for my medical check-up. The service was excellent, with friendly and helpful staff throughout the process. Despite my last-minute request for an additional ultrasound check, they went out of their way to accommodate it. Special thanks to nurse Renee, who was super friendly and took the extra effort to ensure the completeness of the ultrasound scan. I truly appreciate the care and professionalism shown and will definitely return to this branch for my yearly check-ups.

I had my yearly medical checkup at HOP Medical Centre (Tampines) and was thoroughly impressed. The staff were incredibly friendly and professional, making the entire process smooth and pleasant. This was my first time visiting the Tampines outlet, and I must say, the experience was just as superb as my previous visit to their Orchard outlet.

A special shoutout to Aron, whom I believe is the manager. He went above and beyond by ensuring everything was running smoothly. He personally checked in with customers, updated us on our status, and made sure we were comfortable throughout the visit.

The level of care and attention to detail at HOP Medical Centre is truly commendable.
